subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tom Lehman moved into position for his second Champions Tour major victory of the year, shooting a three-under 69 at Crosswater Club in Sunriver, Ore., to take a two-stroke lead in the JELD-WEN Tradition.
snippet: Tom Lehman moved into position for his second Champions Tour major victory of the year, shooting a three-under 69 at Crosswater Club in Sunriver, Ore., to take a two-stroke lead in the JELD-WEN Tradition.
